body: This spell functions like dispel evil, except that you are surrounded by constant, blue lawful energy, and the spell affects chaotic creatures and spells rather than evil ones.
description: +4 bonus against attacks by chaotic creatures.
level_text: Cleric: 5; Inquisitor: 5; Oracle: 5; Paladin: 4; Shaman: 5; Warpriest: 5
name: Dispel Chaos
